text: Jara tumhala ekhadi bhala'i labhate tara tyanna mothe va'ica vatate, matra jevha duhkha yatana pohacate tevha matra khupa anandita hotata. Jara tumhi saburi (dhira-sanyama) rakhala ani svatahla duracarapasuna dura thevata rahala tara tyanci kutaniti tumhala kahica nukasana pohacavinara nahi, sarvasrestha allahane tyancya karavayanna ghera takala ahe
